hoop.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a large ring made of wood, metal, plastic etc
hoop.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a large ring that children used to play with in the past, or that circus animals are made to jump through
hoop.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: the ring that you have to throw the ball through to score points in basketball
hoop.translation[0].definitions[4].defin: an earring that is shaped like a ring
